attractions.title: Playa de Atacames
attractions.description: One of Ecuador's most popular beaches, known for its vibrant nightlife, water sports, and beautiful coastline. Perfect for surfing, swimming, and enjoying the tropical atmosphere.

attractions.title: Manglares de Majagual
attractions.description: A stunning mangrove forest ecosystem where visitors can explore the waterways by boat, observe diverse wildlife, and learn about the importance of mangrove conservation.

attractions.title: Termas de Tachina
attractions.description: Natural hot springs surrounded by lush vegetation. Visitors can enjoy the therapeutic waters while experiencing the peaceful atmosphere of the rainforest.

attractions.title: Playa de Tonsupa
attractions.description: A family-friendly beach with calm waters, perfect for swimming and water activities. Known for its beautiful sunsets and local seafood restaurants.

attractions.title: Reserva Ecológica Mache-Chindul
attractions.description: A protected area featuring diverse ecosystems, hiking trails, and opportunities to observe unique wildlife. A paradise for nature lovers and eco-tourists.

attractions.title: Playa de Mompiche
attractions.description: A hidden gem known for its pristine beaches and excellent surfing conditions. The area offers a perfect blend of natural beauty and local culture.

attractions.title: Cascada de San Rafael
attractions.description: A magnificent waterfall surrounded by lush vegetation. Visitors can enjoy hiking trails, swimming in natural pools, and the refreshing mist of the falls.

attractions.title: Isla de los Pájaros
attractions.description: A small island sanctuary home to various bird species. Perfect for bird watching, photography, and experiencing the rich biodiversity of the region.
